name: Duck HuntR
description:
Relive your youth. Duck HuntR is a tribute to the classic game that took away hours of our youth. Play this classic game in virtual reality. Be IN the game. All graphics and sound has been recreated in painstaking detail to bring you the classic game including clay shooting.

Play two games in one world. The virtual world allows you to play two games in one world. Just turn around and take a look.

Switch hands quickly and easily. With a simple hit of a button you can immediately switch controllers.

We hope you enjoy this game as much as we loved making it.
